name: Oceans Below
overview:
Multimedia diving experience - 17 dive sights in all with original video footage and narration plus color photos, music, graphics, and text
Explore the Caribbean, California Coast, Red Sea, Hawaii, South Pacific, Australia, Sea of Cortez and the Galapagos
Over 200 video segments, over 125 photographs covering underwater animal and plant life, plane wrecks, ship wrecks and more
Learn about spectacular relics from the past by discovering some of the 68 sunken treasures hidden throughout the program
